name: electroncrawler
description: A crawler application built with Electron, updated for macOS 15 compatibility.

scripts.build: npm run build-python && npm run build-electron
scripts.install-python-deps: python-portable/bin/python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip && python-portable/bin/python3 -m pip install -r python/requirements.txt && python-portable/bin/python3 -m playwright install --with-deps chromium
